message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can adjust this in the next rounds if you don't agree.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement this round.
I'm willing to come down to 60/40, but I think it's important to remember that the money is worth less for you each round. Let's make a deal before the inflation hits too hard!
